lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can use them to fly very fast to get away and it's hard for people to hit you as you zoom by and they will get fucked up if they try it.

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd rather not use anything at all, but I have a staff. It's not bad.

lines.text: I'm not very good with it.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think the elven chain, it says medium in equipment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Has plus two to attack and damage rolls.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.text: How else is that word used?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't want to belabor-- your face with this staff!

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Unless we give away a lot of this tonight.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or we can share all of this stuff if that's what you guys want to do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or did we do a really good job of being Hoovers? (slurps) We'll find out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: DM, do we know how much we might have maybe left behind in the time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you guys scooped the majority, I'd say about-- we'll say, four fifths of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Probably going to have to be some redistribution plans so we don't feel like huge festering assholes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want me to not add these things to our or can everybody give what they want?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: When it comes time, we'll figure out what's appropriate, and we can all go in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll set aside my share, but I won't add it to my previous pot yet, I guess.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: While that's going on, has anyone, like, followed us here, looking at us, keeping an eye as they walk by, anything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, we have the door shut.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.text: Then Terra glances over and makes eye contact with you and goes like--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How long to get that dome up?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, it was the first thing I did, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Terra has your attention, she goes ahead and goes--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't all have to go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would prefer to talk first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll watch from from a distance.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Standing outside, how many can we see inside?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could you make room for two more?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (as Terra) "I think we can do that."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I imagine, much like us, you don't have much business "to remain in this space, right?"

lines.text: I think you know all of our names, but I'm not entirely sure that we really know yours.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I see the look of recognition in your eyes."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I hope you'll take it as flattery that your name, even all this time later, still carries great weight from the Menagerie Coast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You all came in a ship, right?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We seem to have pissed it off and since we've been here, it is (clears throat) no longer afloat.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like there's a pearlesence from certain angles that you have to catch yourself on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have you found out who the first members of this village were?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take it from your urgency, that it is quite important for you to get off this island?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you have a way of doing so?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As they arrive, and they will-- well, I'll leave it to your imagination as to what your options might be.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm assuming that you don't either, but if you would, keep an ear out, and as those arrivals start to filter in, we'll make sure that you find your way to a possibility.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, if we can be of any more assistance--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Before you went missing, who you were looking for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (quietly) "What's it to you?" (more emphatic) "What's it to you?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wouldn't it be strange if they were, I don't know, here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, yes, come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I was looking for someone "who stole something very important "to an employer of mine at the time."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take it you didn't find it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We've spent the past few hours, "trying to see if perhaps we had ever crossed paths here, "but no."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: An employer from the Menagerie Coast?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Also, there were two in her group that seemed to have a strange-- Did you see the--?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, they were kind of shiny.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shiny how? What do you mean shiny?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sometimes when you see fish in a certain light.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, or pearlescent, like a pearl, almost.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say just because of your nature, Yasha, you gather there probably was a hint of celestial in their bloodline.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many people were with Kotho?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And they're bounty hunters, or they work for Kotho?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She was, and I assume that they were with her, or at least are now.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, they did say they had been searching for someone that stole a weapon from an employer, along the Menagerie Coast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Twig-- Wouldn't it be funny if it was the Happy Fun Ball? But that couldn't have been.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I feel like Twiggy was sooner.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And the Happy Fun Ball, would you describe it as a weapon?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But that's a weapon! And I point to the bo staff on the ground that Caleb is identifying.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: At least that's what Caleb said.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That bo staff, that I definitely--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it's got runes on it, it looks magical.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look at it. It's a sexy-looking staff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should definitely use it, Beau.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why don't you poke Fjord with it and see what happens?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, poke me with your stick.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sure this will be real bad.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fumph! And I spend a charge.

lines.text: Or at least, I think I do.

lines.text: If I could have you to-- can you roll a strength saving throw for me?

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whooshes, humming impact) Does this one swing and you watch as the wind seems to (slurps) gather, and then this wave of pure crackling force energy just whoosh! Like a giant sickle, just carves through the air, 30 feet out towards you and impacts, knocks the wind out of you and pushes you 15 feet back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I start making all the sounds that woman did when she fell out of the grape crushing pit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It-- all this dust, oomph, kicks up around it, eventually settles and you have--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just hold it and I just pet it, (whispers) I'm never letting you go.

lines.text: Oh, how many times could you do that in a day?

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.text: Oh, Caduceus, do you have any?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I can Healing Word you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can-- yeah, I can do something, yeah.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Either-- yeah, or one of the spell casters or the clerics.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think, it's only for you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's got your name on it, Beau.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think that's made for you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It can go over medium armor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It can go over medium armor.

lines.text: Oh no, my armor is medium. I got in reverse.

lines.text: Actually, that would-- and especially since you're--

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's the bonus of the coat?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know what the bonus of the coat is.

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: ASHLEY

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you'd like to, if you have anything else you want to do in the time being, otherwise we can go into the evening as the village begins to gather.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh hold on, I have a good prop.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, there's some pearls in here.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can use all of that to great effect if you can spare it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, just the three that she pulled.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And how much pearls worth of--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going with that even if it wasn't. 230.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can buy anything we want.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've been poor for so long.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I spent all my money on these fucking bracers, so I've been very poor for a very long time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've had literally thousands of gold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow, that's-- Don't brag about that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think there was an actual map.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was just giving it to you so you have a visual aid.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to go to this gathering.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, did Vilya call the gathering together?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we have anything that we want to influence the villagers to do or not do? We're just going to let them say their piece and the ones who want to leave, we'll help them with boats or no, we're not going to offer our boats?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because then it's going to be up to Vilya to figure out how many people she can take to where and how often.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Take a couple days, figure out what they want.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can't we teleport people as well? If we've been there before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If there is a circle that we have used, and I'm familiar with.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can take us to Zadash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could send them back to Port Damali.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And to Port-- yeah. That's good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you send people without leaving?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, although they might have some explaining to do when they arrive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We would have to alert people. Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But-- wouldn't necessarily have to say anything, but we can say that we will help people get to where they need to go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It would be nice if we could give everybody, like, a little bit of gold on the way through, so that, you know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like a trick-or-treat basket as they they're walking by.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A gift bag, everyone loves a gift bag.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hope you enjoyed your time on Vo.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just take one please, thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So much was destroyed under the volcano but we were able to salvage this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, for a lot of people, a bag of 50 gold can go a long way.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I didn't put my my coin in yet, just in case.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many days has it been?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three, a little over three days, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A lot can happen in three days.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, no, there's the gathering first before bed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still, like, midday at this point, that's what I'm saying--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't you go to sleep, Fjord? It's one in the afternoon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to take a power nap.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys you guys did wake up at the crack of dawn to go fight Vokodo, so, like, your day shifted a little bit earlier than you're used to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm a little hyperglycemic, I need to get some--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I might take a walk around while-- this is-- I feel like being cooped up is-- I want to get a sense of things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If anyone wants to come or otherwise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What is it you guys are looking to do while you're out and about?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you want to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If there's anyone who looks dangerous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some people are shorter than others, some people longer, some people their whole life.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to help set up a bit, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the best you can read, and you can read pretty well, there's no immediate threat of danger at the moment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just listen to people try and get a sense of what their plans are, what they're thinking and just help cook, help--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to look for the family that moved out of the hut that first day that we came in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see him and his wife and their children and they're in the process of helping set up the bonfire and arranging the various stumps and seats, as you approach he goes, "Oh, hello there."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does your last name begin with a "V"?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Berex Valen. How do you know this?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Either you or I do. One of us was--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because I had been going around asking every--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll just you say you do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We didn't put it back, I know we didn't put it back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But thank you, I appreciate the offer."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm happy you guys have each other in this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is complicated, but well," and he put his arms up and says, "It's a beautiful place to live."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: H-how would you guys feel if you know, a whole bunch of visitors came?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That you had a bunch of folks coming in for a bit, "for some sort of meeting."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, we're happy to help, you know, "best we can. You can vouch for these--?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But, oh my gosh, you know, what would be really fun?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if, you know, you and whoever else decided to stay here, like, could turn this place into like, a really awesome resort or something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anybody that ends up leaving, we can turn into, like, a hotel room or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, I could probably do something like that, right?" She's like, "I think so."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And we could probably get a few other folks who are staying back to help.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tomorrow. It's a long day today.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right. Tensions are still a bit high."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we'll wait to sort it all out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Come find us and we'll be happy to help."

lines.name: LIAM
